newsitem.title: USA: Zoran to buy CompCore for $57 million.
newsitem.headline: Zoran to buy CompCore for $57 million.

text.p: Zoran Corp said Monday it had agreed to buy CompCore Multimedia Inc in a deal worth about $57 million.
Zoran said it would give CompCore stockholders 0.6408 of a share of its common stock for every outstanding CompCore share that they owned.
Outstanding options to buy CompCore common stock will be converted into Zoran options, it said.
The deal, to be treated as a pooling of interests, will close in the first quarter of 1997, it added.
Zoran said CompCore will operate as a subsidiary.
Zoran provides integrated circuits for digital video and audio compression applications, while CompCore makes video and audio hardware designs for equipment manufacturers.
